definition: On the day that follows Friday and precedes Sunday, typically used to refer to a specific recurring time period in a week.

examples.german: Ich gehe samstags immer zum Markt.
examples.english: I always go to the market on Saturdays.
We always have soccer practice on Saturdays.

examples.german: Samstags gehen wir oft ins Kino.
examples.english: We often go to the movies on Saturdays.

examples.german: Samstags ist der Supermarkt immer voll.
examples.english: The supermarket is always crowded on Saturdays.
